name: getTrustedDevice
description: Returns a single active TrustedDevice for your User.

$block: A trusted device object represents an active Remember Me session with login.linode.com.

$ul: **created**: When this Remember Me session was started.  This corresponds to the time of login with the "Remember Me" box checked.
**expiry**: When this TrustedDevice session expires.  Sessions typically last 30 days.
**id**: The unique ID for this TrustedDevice
**last_authenticated**: The last time this TrustedDevice was successfully used to authenticate to login.linode.com.
**last_remote_addr**: The last IP Address to successfully authenticate with this TrustedDevice.
**user_agent**: The User Agent of the browser that created this TrustedDevice session.
